square root of 108 plus square root of 48 equals square root of 36 cross times 3 end root plus square root of 16 cross times 3 end root equals square root of 36 cross times square root of 3 plus square root of 16 cross times square root of 3 equals 6 square root of 3 plus 4 square root of 3 equals 10 square root of 3
